findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to malicious code execution.

findings.title: Rebase function can be exploited for unlimited minting
findings.description: The Rebase function allows an attacker to mint tokens without limit.

findings.title: EnableTrading function has no access control
findings.description: The enableTrading function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to execute it.

findings.title: ExcludeFromReward function has no access control
findings.description: The ExcludeFromReward function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to exclude addresses from rewards.

findings.title: IncludeInReward function has no access control
findings.description: The IncludeInReward function lacks proper access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate rewards.

findings.title: ExcludeFromFee function has no access control
findings.description: The ExcludeFromFee function lacks proper access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate fee exclusions.

findings.title: IncludeInFee function has no access control
findings.description: The IncludeInFee function lacks access control, potentially allowing unauthorized users to modify fee settings.

findings.title: SetBlackList function has no access control
findings.description: The SetBlackList function does not have any access control, which could lead to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: SetBuyFee function has no access control
findings.description: The SetBuyFee function does not have any access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: SetSellFee function has no access control
findings.description: The SetSellFee function lacks proper access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to modify fee settings.

findings.title: SetNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function has no access control
findings.description: The SetNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function lacks access control mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized users to modify critical parameters.

findings.title: UpdateRouter function has no access control
findings.description: The updateRouter function does not have any access control, which can lead to unauthorized updates.

findings.title: SetMaxWallet function has no access control
findings.description: The SetMaxWallet function can be called by anyone, lacking access control and potentially allowing unauthorized modifications to the max wallet amount.

findings.title: SetMaxBuyAmount function has no access control
findings.description: The setMaxBuyAmount function can be called by anyone, allowing them to change the max buy amount without any restrictions.
